sourcesContent:
<ion-header [translucent]="true">
  <ion-toolbar>
    <ion-buttons slot="start">
      <ion-menu-button></ion-menu-button>
    </ion-buttons>
    <ion-title> Editar mascota </ion-title>
  </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-content>
  <ion-list lines="full">
    <form [formGroup]="pacienteForm" (ngSubmit)="updatePaciente()">
      
      <ion-label>Selecciona una fecha</ion-label>
      <ion-item>
        <ion-datetime presentation="date" [(ngModel)]="date" formControlName="fecha" displayFormat="DD-MM-YYYY"></ion-datetime>
      </ion-item>

      <ion-label>Selecciona una hora: </ion-label>
      <ion-item>
        <ion-datetime presentation="time" [(ngModel)]="time" formControlName="hora"  displayFormat="hh:mm" ></ion-datetime>
      </ion-item>

      <ion-row>
        <ion-col>
          <ion-button type="submit" color="primary" shape="full" expand="block">Agendar Cita</ion-button>
        </ion-col>
      </ion-row>
      <ion-row>
        <ion-col>
          <ion-button type="submit" color="danger" shape="full" expand="block" routerLink="/home">Cancelar</ion-button>
        </ion-col>
      </ion-row>
      
    </form>
  </ion-list>
</ion-content>
